Text: Installed and running with 45 days. Thanks.

I had this program destroy (corrupt) partitions on me and i started using others and havn't had issues since (many years ago)

I would recommend Raxco Pefect Disk over this, Diskeeper is ugly too lol
after using diskeeper. it removed my audio. had to reinstall audio driver.
I have used Diskeeeper for about 4 years. Works as configured without any problems. Perhaps the problems other people experienced can be attributed to UM (user malfunction).
I have used Diskeeper for about 4 years. Works great. Perhaps the other people are experiencing UM (user malfunction).

Works great, thanks. The installation and help files are in Spanish. If anyone prefers English, download & install the official 30-day trial from Condusiv (latest rev. 1016) as I did and this trial resetter will still work.
Works. Thank's. Better than Perfect Disk
Awesome patch, the new Diskeeper UI 2012 is far better than the 2011 version. Patch will reset trial to 45 days at any time after install...
It looks like the IntelliWrite fragmentation prevention stops to work after 30 days, even resetting the trial period.

The patch would be awesomer if it removed the various UI elements that continually tell you it's trialware, allow the user to get straight to the home screen and auto-reset the trial period on every boot.

All things considered, it's good enough.
